channel.title: Yum on SAMZONG
channel.description: Recent content in Yum on SAMZONG

item.title: Yum中$releasever和$basearch的取值
item.description: 查看/etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo [base] name=CentOS-$releasever - Base mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=$releasever&arch=$basearch&repo=os&infra=$infra #baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/ gpgcheck=1 gpgkey=file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6 $releasever的值,这个表示当前系统的发行版本 [root@ultraera /]# rpm -qi centos-release Name : centos-release Relocations: (not relocatable) Version : 6 Vendor: CentOS Release : 7.

item.title: HowTo Use Remi Install Redis
item.description: Setup 1. Install Frist, To install remi Repo and epel Repo.

item.title: CentOS 6(1) 使用createrepo搭建本地源
item.description: Tips: 本地搭建本地yum源采用的rpm全部来自CentOS-6.7-bin-DVD1&DVD2 1. 测试环境 MacBook Pro 15-inch i7 16GB VMware Fushion 8 Pro CentOS-6.
